abstract: Queens prosecutors say Megan Mele, who has been charged with second-degree grand larceny and criminal possession of forged instrument, stole money from her daughter's medical malpractice settlement.

headline.print_headline: Girl’s Mother Stole Cash, Officials Say
headline.main: Woman Used Daughter’s Medical Settlement for Liposuction, Prosecutors Say

snippet: Megan Mele, 31, of Queens, is charged with taking more than $65,000 meant for her 11-year-old daughter, who had a nerve injury, and using it on plastic surgery and a trip to Disneyland.
lead_paragraph: Megan Mele, 31, of Queens, is charged with taking more than $65,000 meant for her 11-year-old daughter, who had a nerve injury, and using it on plastic surgery and a trip to Disneyland.
